:offset.description: the number of cells to offset Col from the left
:offset.description_zh: 栅格左侧的间隔格数，间隔内不可以有栅格

:order.description: raster order, used in flex layout mode
:order.description_zh: 栅格顺序，`flex` 布局模式下有效

:pull.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the left

:push.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the right

:span.description: raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to display: none
:span.description_zh: 栅格占位格数，为 0 时相当于 `display: none`

:xs.description: '<576px' is a responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:xs.description_zh: `<576px` 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:sm.description: '≥576px' is a responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:sm.description_zh: `≥576px` 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:md.description: '≥768px' responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:md.description_zh: `≥768px` 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:lg.description: '≥992px' responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:lg.description_zh: `≥992px` 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:xl.description: ≥1200px' responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:xl.description_zh: `≥1200px` 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:xxl.description: '≥1600px' responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:xxl.description_zh: `≥1600px` 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象
